summary: Every 40 seconds a person goes missing. In northern Idaho, a group of teenage girls attended a summer camp. They were told it would be a summer of change. It was.
cast: Hallie Todd|Thomas Wilson Brown|Karli Blalock|Anna Goodwin|Larissa Hayden|Lilli Hendrickson|Erin McIntosh|Olivia Meyer|Hailee Naccarato|Jessica Pepeli|Katie Simpson|Brooklyn Tate|Christopher Goodwin|Bailey Morgan|Clark Perry|Joan Hendrickson|Paul Hendrickson
title: The Mooring
